_1: ^Haha! Glad I saw you! My legs were starting to hurt.
^Haha! I'm actually gonna be on time at this rate.
^I just realized I don't have my wallet on me.
^If you give me a ride, next time I'll bring enough to pay you back and then some. Promise.

c-0: ^C'mon! I’ll even leave my hula girl with you. She's probably worth a lot.
c-1: ^Here, I’ll give you my precious hula girl as a promise that I’ll be back next time.

p1: ^I can tell you're a good guy, since you let me stay.
^This town could use more good people.
^Man...there's this girl who's got me all nervous.

c-0: ^I try to visit her at work but she won't let me stay long. Says I distract her.
^I get it. I mean, who wouldn't be distracted by all this?
^I bet she's happy to see me, though.
^Whenever I close my eyes I can see her smiling.
^She's given me more chances than I deserve.
c-1: ^A girl that speaks her mind is easier to deal with for sure.
^When my ex and I would fight she would ignore me for days.
^Hah, well...<glitch>love</glitch> might be a strong word, but...
^Whenever I close my eyes I can see her smiling.
^She's given me more chances than I deserve.

p2: ^I just don't wanna mess this one up.
^I remember when I first got to talkin' with her a few months ago.
^She used to work at the diner my uncle runs.
^My uncle's an asshole and one time she snapped at him.
^Someone needed to get him off his horse.
^Smart and strong...I could learn a lot from her.
^Ah...sorry, I drank a bit before this.
^Didn't mean to get sappy with you.
^I've just been down on my luck recently. Drinkin' helps.
^Ah shit what am I sayin'! You're driving! Haha, that could've been bad.
^Man... it just feels like things need to slow down.
^My Grandpa's age has been catchin' up to him.
^That stubborn old man actually lets me help him now.
^We used to get into these loud arguments, but it's been real quiet lately.
^It's weird. You'd think I'd like having peace in the house, but it just reminds me that he won't be here forever.
^Or money! I could always use more of that.
^Though, once I finally do get rich, I'll get a new car that actually works. An '06 Pluto, bright red.
^And I'll leave this town with my girl.
^...I'll probably leave Grandpa something, too. Least I could do.
^Thanks again for letting me stay earlier. I swear I have the money to pay for this ride, just not on me.
^Speakin' of money, Driver, give me some lotto numbers!
p3: ^I usually just choose the same numbers over and over.
^Maybe that's why I haven't won yet.
^Ah, I mean it's Quinton. I'm Quinton.
^Who else applied to work at this shithole?! I'm perfectly capable!
^That happened years ago, who even cares—
^I've applied to a ton of different places and I've got nothin' to show for it.
^They don't want me because of some shit I didn't even do.
^Hey Driver, here's some advice: don't be like me.
^If somethin' seems too good to be true, it is. Money ain't free.
^I got in some deep shit with a few sharks a while back.
^Long story short, I ended up takin' the fall for someone who I thought was a friend in order to clear my debt.
^Honestly, I don't even know what the court was sayin' I did.
^Thinkin' about it pisses me off to no end.
^Reminds me that the real bastards who did it walked away scot-free.

b: ^Hey, thanks again for listening to me earlier.
^You might see more of me, I probably won't be getting a new car soon.
^Riding in here was a nice break from all the stuff I gotta deal with.
^Thanks, this was much better than walking.
